lead_paragraph: SEERY--Carol Ranney, 88, on July 7. Graduated College of St. Rose, 1949 and received masters degree from Boston College. Nuclear engineer and co-author of Reactor Shielding Design Manual (1956), math teacher, hospital volunteer. Survived by husband Jim, children Florie, Jimmy and Michael, sister Mary Aileen and grandchildren Grace, Maggie, Lucy, Seamus, Owen, Angela, Alasdair and Kate. Funeral July 14, 11am at Church of the Epiphany, 375 2nd Ave. Memorial contribution may be made to: Camphillfoundation.org. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SEERY, CAROL RANNEY
